fields.description:
I got this exception out of the blue on a standalone ActiveMQ broker which was running for 8 days at that time. I set the priority to critical as we lost a lot of data due to this bug.

{code}

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

versions.description: Maintenance release with new AMQP support and smaller modules
